message.original: "誰かの日記の１ページが落ちている"
message.translation: "A page of someone's diary has fallen"

message.original: 俺も腕には自信があるつもりだが、 正直言って今回はヒヤリとさせられた―― 侵食されたグリフィンとは、これほど凶暴なものか
message.translation: I am confident in my weapons, but if I am honest, this time I may have made a mistake... Is this Infected Griffin as ferocious as they say?

message.original: さすがに今回ばかりは、落命すら覚悟した まだ命がある事、感謝せねば――
message.translation: As one would expect, even though I was prepared to die, I still live, and I must not take that for granted...

message.original: ともあれ、そろそろ収集物も増えてきた―― 持ち歩くにも動きづらいため ひとまとまりにして保管しておくことにしよう
message.translation: Anyway, my collection has recently grown in size... I've decided to keep it all in one place, as it is getting hard to carry it around everywhere with me.

message.original: 魔物の巣になるばかりの うち捨てられた建物があった 村に置き去るよりは、そこの方が安心だろう
message.translation: There was an abandoned building nearby. It would be much more secure to put it there, than to leave it in the village, only for it to become some monster's nest.

message.original: 印象的なその姿―― 我がアジトを『塔』と名付けよう
message.translation: What an impressive figure... My own secret hideout, I'll call it the "Tower".
